PyDataSource.AddOn.count¶

AddOn.count(attr=None, gain=None, unit=None, doc=None, roi=None, name=None, limits=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Count (i.e., sum) of detector within optional roi.

Parameters:
  • attr (str) – Name of data object in detector object on which to act
  • gain (float) – optional converion from ADU to for example X-rays.
  • limits (tuple) – (low, high) values to be counted.
  • doc (str) – Doc string for resulting roi data
  • unit (str) – Units of histogramed data. Default ADU (times gain factor if supplied)
  • roi (tuple, optional) – Region of interest (roi) parameters passed to roi method. roi method then acts on this reduced data
